successes.title: SCIENCE: Ruining Everything Since 1543 (an SMBC Collection)
successes.description: "SCIENCE: Ruining Everything Since 1543" is a collection of new & old SMBC comics all about science and scientists.

Pledges.description: Save a tree, kill an electron.
THE BEDROCK: [eBook + Book] Kill a tree, kill an electron.
THE POWER PACK: [eBook + Book + Bookmark] The bookmark is a conversion chart for weird and/or worthless units!

THE NERD PACK [eBook + Book + Bookmark + Notebook] A handy little pocket notebook, the cover of which has "SCIENCE: Ruining Everything Since 1543" written on it, along with a crossed out geocentric universe.
THE DORK PACK [eBook + Book + Bookmark + Poster] A poster with a pictographic list of 18 things science has ruined since 1543.
THE GEEK PACK [eBook + Book + Bookmark + Shirt] A shirt with the same design as the poster, showing 18 things ruined by science since 1543.
THE HARD POWER: [eBook + HARDCOVER Book + Bookmark] The bookmark is a conversion chart for weird and/or worthless units!
THE MULTI-NERD [eBook + 3 SIGNED Books + 3 Bookmarks] Ain't no party like a multi-nerd party.
THE HERO PACK [eBook + Book + Bookmark + Notebook + Poster + Shirt]

THE COLLECTOR [eBook + SIGNED book + Bookmark + Notebook + Poster + Shirt + Another of Zach's books of your choice, signed] Zach's other books are "Save Yourself Mammal" "The Most Dangerous Game" and "Trial of the Clone." The first two are comic collections, and the third is a choosable adventure gamebook.

THE CONNOISSEUR [eBook + SIGNED book + Bookmark + Notebook + Poster + Shirt + TWO of Zach's other books of your choice, signed] Zach's other books are "Save Yourself Mammal" "The Most Dangerous Game" and "Trial of the Clone." The first two are comic collections, and the third is a choosable adventure gamebook.
THE HARD HERO [eBook + Limited Edition Hardcover + Bookmark + Notebook + Poster + Shirt]
THE WHOLE WEINER [eBook + SIGNED book + Bookmark + Notebook + Poster + Shirt + ALL THREE of Zach's other books, signed]
THE HARD WEINER [eBook + SIGNED Limited Edition Hardcover + Bookmark + Notebook + Poster + Shirt + ALL THREE of Zach's other books, signed]
THE ARTENING: Any one of the above packs, + Zach makes you a custom drawing of your choice. (If you do not make a choice... enjoy your nude Zach)
THE BENEFACTOR: Any pack above that you want, PLUS:
